entry.title: Locked out of NZ because of Covid-19, family fights for seven months to find their way home

media:group.media:title: Locked out of NZ because of Covid-19, family fights for seven months to find their way home
media:group.media:description: The Badenhorsts, who travelled to South Africa in early March to renew their passports, first spoke to Fair Go months ago as they continued to pay bills in NZ but couldn’t get in. A lot has happened since then. Source: Fair Go

entry.title: After tumultuous 2020, should Kiwis expect Christmas gifts from their employers this year?

media:group.media:title: After tumultuous 2020, should Kiwis expect Christmas gifts from their employers this year?
media:group.media:description: Employment relations advisor Courtney Woods explained to Seven Sharp the merits in gift-giving, even if it’s been a tough year financially. Seven Sharp’s junior reporters interrogated the PM at a secret bunker. Join Hilary Barry, Jeremy Wells and the team for a fresh perspective on today’s stories.
